medical_history.chief_complaint: 3 day history of RUQ/Epigastric abdominal pain associated with emesis and nausea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started after she ate more heavy food late in the evening. Since her previous episode of gallstone pancreatitis, she has not had significant attacks of RUQ abdominal pain. At the time of evaluation in the ED, she states that her RUQ pain has subsided.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Fibroid Uterus, gallstone pancreatitis (s/p ERCP and sphincterotomy).
medical_history.family_history: Mother with breast cancer at age unspecified, deceased from acute myelogenous leukemia at age unspecified. Aunt with pancreatic cancer.
